channel.title: Adding ruby/diamond/dragon ammy to edge shop
channel.description: when i add these items to the shop in edgeville i cannot purchase them nor can i sell them, is there another file i need to edit before adding these beneficial items to this particular shop :D

item.title: Adding ruby/diamond/dragon ammy to edge shop
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:330116”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=426371.msg3132653#msg3132653 date=1266631184]

You also need to edit items.rscd on client side
[/quote]No you don’t…

Yes, he does. He’s changed the server-side ItemsDef.xml.gz to alter their price, but the client has a different price so you can’t sell/buy.[/quote]Oh nevermind, didn’t see he changed being stackable.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding ruby/diamond/dragon ammy to edge shop
